attributes.action: Lower the age to vote in the General Election to at least 11 years old.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think and i hope people agree that children should be able to decide the future of their lives as well as older people they should be able to decide what is going to happen and so that children get a more fairer chance and get a better opportunity to change the country as they are going to be living her longer than the older generation surely it is right that they can decide the future of the country rather than have to stick with the decision already made by the older generation.
If you think this to please sign this petition and help the future of the country.
